product_name: lucy Relay Ready Bra Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Stay cool during yoga no matter how difficult the pose in the lucy Relay Ready Bra Tank Top. It features an internal shelf bra for light support and performance fabric to wick sweat away from skin. Fabric is soft and cool on your skin, dries quickly and wicks moisture to keep you comfortable; spandex offers smooth and supportive 4-way stretch. Internal shelf bra offers light support. lucy Relay Ready Bra Tank Top features a body hugging fit. Flatlock seams; reflectivity.
short_description: Stay cool during yoga no matter how difficult the pose in the lucy Relay Ready Bra Tank Top. It features an internal shelf bra for light support and performance fabric to wick sweat away from skin.
